scripts.compose-dev:win32: @powershell docker-compose -f main/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --project-directory . --project-name oh run -d --service-ports -e ETHERSCAN_KEY=$env:npm_package_config_ETHERSCAN_KEY -e DEBUG=$env:npm_package_config_DEBUG oh-eth
scripts.compose-dev:darwin:freebsd:linux:sunos: docker-compose -f main/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --project-directory . --project-name oh run -d --service-ports -e ETHERSCAN_KEY=$npm_package_config_ETHERSCAN_KEY -e DEBUG=$npm_package_config_DEBUG oh-eth
scripts.rediscli: docker run -it --rm --link redis:redis --net oh_default redis redis-cli -h redis -p 6379
scripts.clean:win32: @powershell docker rm (docker kill (docker ps -a -q --filter name=oh-eth)) ; docker rmi oh-eth:latest
scripts.clean:darwin:freebsd:linux:sunos: docker rm $(docker kill $(docker ps -a -q --filter name=oh-eth)) ; docker rmi oh-eth:latest
